card_text: If you control a monster that is not an "Infernoid" monster, send this card to the Graveyard. You can only use each of these effects of "Void Purification" once per turn.$N●During each of your opponent's Standby Phases: You can target 1 "Infernoid" monster in your Graveyard; add it to your hand.$N●During each of your Standby Phases: You can target 1 of your banished "Infernoid" monsters; return it to the Graveyard.
